column5: Our newly built home on 15 acres is one mile from anglers' paradise Lake Fork. We offer a private upstairs suite with an on-suite bath and 2 downstairs bedrooms with a shared Jacuzzi bath. Fisherman and family friendly - up to 7 adults and cribs are available for the little ones. Current fishing advice and a gourmet breakfast included. Safe and secure concrete boat parking with power provided. Country living lessons (canning, bread-, cheese-, and sausage-making) available. Welcome home!
column8: Stella Luna: Country Home & Gourmet Breakfast
